video.title: Quantum Leap
video.synopsis: Physicist Sam Beckett "leaps" into the bodies of people who need his help, getting assistance from a friend from the future who appears as a hologram.

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a boxer owned by nuns hoping to finance a new chapel with their share of his purse. However, he's set to take a dive in the next fight.
episodes.title: The Right Hand of God

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a rural veterinarian and finds himself involved in a cowboy competition. The prize? A cowgirl heiress who's promised to wed him.
episodes.title: How the Tess Was Won

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a mafia assassin who's playing with fire by dating the don's best girl, and efforts to bring Sam back home cause a massive blackout.
episodes.title: Double Identity

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Southern black man who chauffeurs for an elderly widow. Sam tries to affect positive changes in her and her world before leaping on.
episodes.title: The Color of Truth

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Southern California teen whose older sister is about to marry an abusive hot rod fanatic. Sam hopes to expose abuser's true colors.
episodes.title: Camikazi Kid

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Humphrey Bogart look-alike, private investigator Nick Allen. He tries to find his partner's killer without becoming a victim himself.
episodes.title: Play It Again, Seymour

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a newlywed cop. While avoiding his bride's brutal ex-husband, he must change history or risk being in 1960 forever.
episodes.title: Honeymoon Express

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a sailor returning from Japan to his small hometown. But he must persuade his family and community to accept his Japanese wife.
episodes.title: The Americanization of Machiko

episodes.synopsis: Sam is surprised to find that he's leapt into a gorgeous woman. Now, he must deal with his lecherous boss and try to save his suicidal roommate.
episodes.title: What Price Gloria?

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a renowned blind pianist. He must rescue his girlfriend from a serial, while avoiding the intrusions of her interfering mother.
episodes.title: Blind Faith

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a disc jockey in Peoria. While conservatives try to block the station from playing rock 'n' roll, Sam helps battle against them.
episodes.title: Good Morning, Peoria

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a rabbi in time to try to prevent his sister-in-law's affair. Meanwhile, he helps the family grieve the death of their son.
episodes.title: Thou Shalt Not..

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a mentally challenged man and tries to gain acceptance from his coworkers to keep his brother from sending him back to an institution.
episodes.title: Jimmy

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Southern lawyer in mid trial. He must defend a black woman accused of murdering a member of the town's most prominent white family.
episodes.title: So Help Me God

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into the understudy for an intoxicated star and must prevent the actor from falling and injuring himself onstage.
episodes.title: Catch a Falling Star

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a psychic. Sam must save a young widow from her desire to join her late spouse at the bottom of the lake where he drowned.
episodes.title: A Portrait for Troian

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into the rowdiest fraternity brother on campus. Now, he must befriend an antiwar activist and stop her from bombing the chemistry building.
episodes.title: Animal Frat

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a divorced mother of three and must prevent the family's teenage son from running away and disappearing forever.
episodes.title: Another Mother

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a high school quarterback and must stop his wide-receiver friend from purposely losing the game and risking both their scholarships.
episodes.title: All Americans

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into an FBI agent charged with protecting a witness from a mafia hit man -- but an unknown informant makes the job difficult.
episodes.title: Her Charm

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Native American and must help his grandfather run away from a nursing home and return to the reservation to die with dignity.
episodes.title: Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a trapeze artist and must fight his fear of heights while stopping his sister from performing the same stunt that killed their mother.
episodes.title: Leaping in Without a Net

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into Buster, the friend of a stripper who has kidnapped a baby girl. Sam must try to convince the wacky kidnapper to return the infant.
episodes.title: Maybe Baby

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a man whose well-to-do ex-wife is on the verge of marrying a vicious mobster. Now, he must do everything he can to prevent the wedding.
episodes.title: Sea Bride

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into an undercover detective. Sam must persuade a Navy nurse that her MIA husband is alive to prevent her from marrying another man.
episodes.title: M.I.A

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into himself as a teenager. He tries to lead his high school basketball team to a championship and save his family members from tragedies.
episodes.title: The Leap Home: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Navy SEAL who's serving with his brother. Sam must determine whether he is to save his brother or ensure the mission's success.
episodes.title: The Leap Home: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a horror novelist. When people connected to the writer begin to die mysteriously, Sam must figure out what's going on.
episodes.title: The Boogieman

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Miss Deep South Beauty Pageant contestant. He must keep a rival from making a life-altering mistake and place in the top three.
episodes.title: Miss Deep South

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into an African-American medical student. He must save his white fiancée by convincing her to stay in Watts during the 1965 Watts Riots.
episodes.title: Black and White on Fire

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a magician caught in a custody battle. He must stop his young daughter (also his assistant) from performing a life-threatening trick.
episodes.title: The Great Spontini

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a 13-year-old boy mistreated by his older sister. He must shield the boy from harm and stop his mother from abandoning the family.
episodes.title: Runaway

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into an unwed pregnant teen and must mend the rift between the girl and her father, giving her the support to keep her child.
episodes.title: 8 1/2 Months

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a children's sci-fi TV series actor. He must help his offbeat co-star, who's in danger of being killed or put in a mental institution.
episodes.title: Future Boy

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a nightclub piano player and murder witness hiding from a mafia hit man. He must save himself and his ex-girlfriend from the killer.
episodes.title: Piano Man

episodes.synopsis: Arriving in 1961, Sam leaps into the owner of a New Orleans brothel and must prevent the imminent death of one of his girls.
episodes.title: Southern Comforts

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a rock band's lead singer who's in danger of being stabbed to death. He must find the would-be murderer and stop the coming tragedy.
episodes.title: Glitter Rock

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a bounty hunter transporting a woman accused of embezzling. Sam must determine whether to help her escape or put her behind bars.
episodes.title: A Hunting We Will Go

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a convicted murderer just before execution. He receives a reprieve, but Sam has only 48 hours to fulfill his mission, then he can leap.
episodes.title: Last Dance Before Execution

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a mental patient as he's receiving electroshock therapy. With Sam's brain scrambled, Al must complete the mission and help Sam.
episodes.title: Shock Theater

episodes.synopsis: A bolt of lightning causes Al and Sam to switch duties for this 1945 mission. With Sam's aid, Al must save a World War II hero and his girlfriend.
episodes.title: The Leap Back

episodes.synopsis: As a Major League pitcher banished to the minors, Sam fends off the team owner's daughter and helps a headstrong rookie avoid a self-destructive path.
episodes.title: Play Ball

episodes.synopsis: While Hurricane Camille strikes the Gulf Coast, Sam, as a small-town deputy sheriff, must keep residents safe while protecting a nurse from a killer.
episodes.title: Hurricane

episodes.synopsis: To save a young black civil rights leader's life, Sam must leap into a Ku Klux Klansman and explain to his host's son the immorality of racism.
episodes.title: Justice

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into the life of a top Beverly Hills hairstylist. Sam must protect his girlfriend's son from a killer after the boy witnesses a murder.
episodes.title: Permanent Wave

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into the body of a rape victim hesitant to press charges against the town's revered golden boy. Sam must ensure the charges stick.
episodes.title: Raped

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into Bobo the chimp, a candidate in the 1961 space program. Sam must work hard to qualify for the launch or face brutal animal testing.
episodes.title: The Wrong Stuff

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a detective who's investigating a murder. Sam is the next casualty unless the victim's son and her husband's psychiatrist offer help.
episodes.title: Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Sam, as traveling rainmaker Billy Beaumont, must bring rain to a drought-stricken farm town-- while shaking off the advances of his brother's wife.
episodes.title: A Single Drop of Rain

episodes.synopsis: Sam escapes a chain gang with wrongly accused black convict Boone. Sam must prove Boone's innocence to spare him from 15 more years of hard labor.
episodes.title: Unchained

episodes.synopsis: As San Francisco TV reporter Dillon Powell, Sam must protect a gorgeous psychic from a serial killer. But soon Sam's mission turns deeply personal.
episodes.title: Temptation Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Sam faces a high-noon shootout as ex-gunfighter Tyler Means. Sam consoles Mean's grandson, who's disillusioned by his grandpa's tarnished image.
episodes.title: The Last Gunfighter

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into Cheree, a singer in a teen band. Sam must stop bandmate Lynell from signing with a sleazy agent and help her reconcile with her dad.
episodes.title: A Song for the Soul

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a plane's cockpit flying over the Bermuda Triangle. His limited flying skills are tested when his holographic link to Al is cut short.
episodes.title: Ghost Ship

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into Roberto, a TV talk show host. He and a coworker team up and uncover serious wrongdoing at the local pesticide and fertilizer plant.
episodes.title: Roberto!

episodes.synopsis: An obsessed female fan kidnaps Sam -- who inhabits the body of a soap opera star -- hoping that the actor will father her baby.
episodes.title: Moments to Live

episodes.synopsis: Sam trolls the Egyptian ruins as archaeologist Dale Conway. But trouble begins when his camp is stricken by a sandstorm and a pharaoh's ancient curse.
episodes.title: The Curse of Ptah-Hotep

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into one-third of a seriously unfunny comedy trio and must convince his cohorts that they're in love with each other.
episodes.title: Stand Up

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Greek sailor stranded on an island with a beautiful woman. But the young woman is a spoiled brat bent on making Sam's life miserable.
episodes.title: Leaping Of The Shrew

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into an escaped convict who's holding a mother and daughter hostage. Al must track down the real killer, leaving Gushie as Sam's advisor.
episodes.title: Killin' Time

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into an elderly man who sees UFOs. Sam must stop authorities from locking him up while also dealing with a family drug problem.
episodes.title: Star Light, Star Bright

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps back into Jimmy LaMotta to find the mentally challenged man in a precarious situation. Meanwhile, Sam bumps into a fellow time traveler.
episodes.title: Deliver Us From Evil

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a small Louisiana town in 1955 and tries to protect Abigail Fuller from Leta Aider, a powerful woman who believes Abigail is a killer.
episodes.title: One Little Heart: Trilogy Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into Abigail Fuller's fiancé. When nemesis Leta Aider hurls terrible accusations at Abigail, Sam tries to deter any vigilante justice.
episodes.title: For Your Love: Trilogy Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps a lawyer whose client is thirty-something Abigail Fuller. Abigail is accused of murdering her longtime nemesis, Leta Aider.
episodes.title: The Last Door: Trilogy Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Sam finds himself in the midst of a bank robbery in his home town. Sam gets involved in a battle between a crooked financier and the two brothers.
episodes.title: Promised Land

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a traveling salesman with a big secret: He has two families. Ziggy tells Sam he must choose, but the troubles don't stop at bigamy.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Sweeties

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a 1960s-era feminist. As a housewife and mom of two, Sam faces a life-or-death situation when one daughter prepares for a protest.
episodes.title: Liberation

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into sex psychologist Dr. Ruth Westheimer. He takes over her talk radio show, while the real Dr. Ruth gives Al private counseling sessions.
episodes.title: Dr. Ruth

episodes.synopsis: After leaping into an artist with an occult lifestyle, Sam is a race against time to stop a bloodthirsty vampire from performing a ritual killing.
episodes.title: Blood Moon

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a troubled college nerd who wages a bizarre fight against a cruel hazing ritual. Meanwhile, Sam makes Alia his time-traveling partner.
episodes.title: Return of The Evil Leaper

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Alia leap into a female convict accused of killing an inmate. They land on death row, and Alia's the prime prey of her former Observer, Zoey.
episodes.title: Revenge of the Evil Leaper

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into Marilyn Monroe's driver as the distraught star struggles with fame and heartache and tries to help as her life spirals out of control.
episodes.title: Goodbye Norma Jean

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into a Vietnam vet who cares for his epileptic war buddy in need of meds. Sam tries to help, but he's blocked by the secretive town sheriff.
episodes.title: The Beast Within

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into his great-grandfather. Sam fights to keep his family tree intact and helps the relatives of an important historical figure.
episodes.title: The Leap Between the States

episodes.synopsis: Sam leaps into Elvis Presley just days before his big break. Sam keeps Elvis on the path to fame, but he gets involved with a troubled singer.
episodes.title: Memphis Melody
